explains: n. 肉片；鱼片；（猪、牛等的）里脊
wordGroup: filet mignon （法）菲列牛排（等于filet dé mignon）

sentences.en: Guest: Yes. bring me a bottle of wine and filet steak.
sentences.cn: 顾客：是的，给我一瓶葡萄酒和一份腓力牛排。

sentences.en: Go deep sea fishing and learn to filet and cook your own fish.
sentences.cn: 去深海打鱼并学着切鱼片、为自己烹鱼。

sentences.en: They feasted us on filet mignon and strawberry shortcake.
sentences.cn: 他们拿出鱼片和草莓松脆饼盛情款待我们。
